    #include <stdio.h>
    #include <stdint.h>
    #include "charon_address_guesses.h"
    void f(int *p) {
      int j=5;
      *p=7;
      printf("j=%d\n",j); 
    }
    int main() {
      uintptr_t i = ADDRESS_PFI_1P;
      int *p = (int*)i;
      f(p);
    }
[link to run test in Cerberus]
